messages.title: THERE’S ONLY ONE SURE WAY TO GET THE CHANGE WE NEED
messages.content: Dear Residents, It has been a great privilege to have been your MP for the past five years. However, as the forthcoming General Election will decide the next five years... A new Conservative majority government will get Britain back on the road to recovery and a brighter future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We have to set a new direction for Britain. We will deliver Brexit and unleash Britain’s potential.
We will resolve confidence-sapping political arguments and rebuild the economy.

We will make far-reaching commitments to more homes, flexible tenures, delivering affordable homes and will lead a Local Liberate to Build initiative to unlock the potential from within our communities.
A points-based immigration system to control and lower the number of unskilled workers coming into the country, reducing the pressure on our public services.
We will stand alongside doctors, nurses and hospital staff to ensure we have the world-class hospitals and services that you expect and deserve.
Record financial investment in schools to raise standards.
Tough new measures to keep your family and community safer.

issues.brexitEurope: We will deliver Brexit and unleash Britain’s potential.
issues.economy: We will resolve confidence-sapping political arguments and rebuild the economy.
issues.education: Record financial investment in schools to raise standards.
issues.health: We will stand alongside doctors, nurses and hospital staff to ensure we have the world-class hospitals and services that you expect and deserve.
issues.immigration: A points-based immigration system to control and lower the number of unskilled workers coming into the country, reducing the pressure on our public services.

housing.content: We will make far-reaching commitments to more homes, flexible tenures, delivering affordable homes and will lead a Local Liberate to Build initiative to unlock the potential from within our communities.

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been a great privilege to have been your MP for the past five years.

politicalExperience.achievements: Successfully answered over 150,000 emails, and attended to over 3,000 cases across his constituency.

endorsements.endorsement: My wife and I...are very impressed by your thoroughness in the due generation...to your constituents and as such, we will be...in the forthcoming election.

quotes.text: I know that like me, you will have been appalled by the misuse of MPs' expenses. As you know, I did not abuse my own expenses in any way.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Geoffrey is well known by local people of all political shades as an honest, hard-working constituency MP who places serving our community at the heart of what he does.
